summary: Update Ruby SDK to confirm/assert compatibility with Ruby 4 and consider dropping support for Ruby 3.2 at end-of-life. Requires updates to CI, documentation, and compatibility testing.
userImpact: Users want confirmation and support for Ruby 4, and clarity on when Ruby 3.2 support will be dropped.
proposedFix: Update CI configuration, documentation, and conduct compatibility testing for Ruby 4. Drop Ruby 3.2 support after EOL.
resolutionDetails: Issue was completed and closed, indicating Ruby 4 support was implemented and CI/docs were updated.
keyQuote: Need to update CI, docs, etc to confirm/assert Ruby 4 compatibility. Also consider dropping 3.2 support if it goes EOL as expected.
